Mayor’s Office
==============



### City Mayor

John Ferguson
-------------

Welcome to our City of Presidio website.  If there is anything we can do to help you, please do not hesitate to ask.  I regularly monitor my email and Facebook page, and if at all possible, I will make time to meet with you personally to discuss any aspect of our city business (or to brag a little about our great little town!).

[Read More](https://presidiotx.us/?page_id=34#)

![John Ferguson Profile](https://presidiotx.us/wp-content/uploads/2025/01/John-Ferguson-222x285.jpg)

[Email
=====

jferguson@presidio.tx](https://presidiotx.us/?page_id=34#)

[Facebook: Presidio, Texas Mayor](https://presidiotx.us/?page_id=34#)
